short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will convert a number into words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simplest extension that you need to easily convert a number into English words.  The UI is very simple and user friendly.

If you want to convert a number into other languages such as German, Spanish, Hungarian, etc, feel free to visit our website.
